org.framed.orm.ui.command.shapes

Class ORMShapeDeleteCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Command
      • org.framed.orm.ui.command.shapes.ORMShapeDeleteCommand

  • public class ORMShapeDeleteCommand
extends Command
    Through this command all Shapes can be deleted(removed from the model tree).
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Model parent
      The Model from which the Shape should be removed.
      protected List<Relation> relations
      A list, which contains all Relations that are connected to the Shape to be removed.
      protected Shape shape
      The Shape to be removed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ORMShapeDeleteCommand()
      Constructor of this command, where the label is set, which describes this command to the user and the relations list is initialized.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void detachLinks()
      Detach/Delete all Relations from this Shape and their source/target Shape and storing the connection information in local data structures.
      void execute()
      In this method the Shape is deleted/removed from the model tree through setting the parent Model reference on null and through the deletion of all Relations which connected to this Shape.
      void setShape(Shape shape)
      Setter for the Shape, which is to be removed in this command.
      void undo()
      This command is undone though resetting of the parent Model reference on the initial value and through the recreation of all Relations which connected to this Shape.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • shape

        protected Shape shape
        The Shape to be removed.

      • parent

        protected Model parent
        The Model from which the Shape should be removed.

      • relations

        protected List<Relation> relations
        A list, which contains all Relations that are connected to the Shape to be removed. This list necessary for the case that the user wants to undo this command.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ORMShapeDeleteCommand

        public ORMShapeDeleteCommand()
        Constructor of this command, where the label is set, which describes this command to the user and the relations list is initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        In this method the Shape is deleted/removed from the model tree through setting the parent Model reference on null and through the deletion of all Relations which connected to this Shape.

      • undo

        public void undo()
        This command is undone though resetting of the parent Model reference on the initial value and through the recreation of all Relations which connected to this Shape.

      • detachLinks

        protected void detachLinks()
        Detach/Delete all Relations from this Shape and their source/target Shape and storing the connection information in local data structures.

      • setShape

        public void setShape(Shape shape)
        Setter for the Shape, which is to be removed in this command. The local parent variable is set here as well.
        Parameters:
        shape - org.framed.orm.model.Shape
